product_name: Eagle Creek ORV Super Trunk Wheeled Duffel - 36"
long_description: The Eagle Creek ORV Super Trunk, a high-capacity wheeled duffel with thoughtful organization details, is designed for extra long trips, large families or week-plus multisport adventures.
short_description: The Eagle Creek ORV Super Trunk, a high-capacity wheeled duffel with thoughtful organization details, is designed for extra long trips, large families or week-plus multisport adventures.
